remarks: An upper bound for the cardinality of the union of an image.  Theorem 10.48 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 99.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Mar-2006.)
statement:
uniimadom.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
uniimadom.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
uniimadom $p |- ( ( Fun F /\ A. x e. A ( F ` x ) ~<_ B ) -> U. ( F " A ) ~<_ ( A X. B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
